name: Screens
Pre Lift
Area accessible & ready
Screen number
Confirm concrete strength MPA 25 has been reached at supporting level
Signage in place
Exclusion Zone with name and number of supervisor? Ground level and Slab level
Spotters in place
WMS ready and signed on to
Platforms cleaned and clear from rubbish
All loose materials removed from edge
Edge protection installed on Level/s to be exposed once lifted
Deflector shields removed
Radio communication woking between screen crew
Hydraulic lifting Apparatus installed correctly if using lifter
Screen Free from Debris
All wire infills detached
Confirm ready for lift with all involved - Team Leader
Work at heights permit completed - attach or take photo of permit
Post Lift
Ensure all gaps are closed
Mesh to be install where required
Double check all needles are secure and double nuts in place
Clean and clear area
Remove exclusion zones and barricades
Bar caps for protruding z bars
